db:abstract.db:para: Provides attached properties for items pushed onto a StackView.

db:listitem.db:para: Stack is part of Buttons and Controls

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The Stack type provides attached properties for items pushed onto a StackView. It gives specific information about the item, such as its status and index in the stack view the item is in.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] Stack.index : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the index of the item inside StackView, so that StackView.get(index) will return the item itself. If view is null, index will be -1.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] Stack.status : enumeration
db:section.db:para: This property holds the status of the item. It can have one of the following values:

db:listitem.db:para: Stack.Inactive: the item is not visible
Stack.Activating: the item is transitioning into becoming an active item on the stack
Stack.Active: the item is on top of the stack
Stack.Deactivating: the item is transitioning into becoming inactive

db:section.db:title: [read-only] Stack.view : StackView
db:section.db:para: This property holds the StackView the item is in. If the item is not inside a StackView, view will be null.
